casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dewey G. SPRINKLE. No. 570P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2005. Mercedes O. Chut, Greensboro, for Dewey Graceaon Sprinkle. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of October 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2005."
